mapper.select: SELECT R.NO, R.B_NO, M.NAME REPLIER, R.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.REPLY_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') REPLY_DATE, p.name POSITION FROM BOARD_REPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON M.NO = REPLIER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = M.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POS_NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B_NO = #{no} AND m.resign_yn = 'N'
